      • fillDeck

        public static void fillDeck(Card[] deck)
        The fillDeck is passed a Card array of 52. The deck is filled with one of each type to create a standard deck of playing cards
        Parameters:
        deck - Representing the array of Cards
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or the length < 1

      • shuffle

        public static void shuffle(Card[] deck)
        The shuffle deck mixes up the array of cards. The number of times you want to shuffle is up to you
        Parameters:
        deck - Representing the array of cards in a standard deck
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or the length < 1

      • dealCards

        public static Card dealCards(Card[] deck,
                             int index)
        The dealCards method returns the top card from the deck
        Parameters:
        deck - Representing the array of cards in a standard deck
        index - Representing the index value of the top of the deck
        Returns:
        Card Representing the Card on teh top of the Deck
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or the length < 1
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the paramater is < 0 or >= array length

      • calcHandScore

        public static int calcHandScore(Card[] hand)
        The calcHandScore is passed an array of cards. The method walks thru the array and determines the underlying value of the card.
        Parameters:
        hand - Representing the array of Cards
        Returns:
        int representing the underlying value of the cards
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or the length < 1

        Throws:
